title: Transforming Enterprise Finance Operations
subtitle: How we built FinFlow to process $2B+ in monthly transactions

problem.summary: Enterprise finance teams were struggling with fragmented systems, manual reconciliation, and lack of real-time visibility into financial health.
details: Finance teams using 5+ disconnected tools for daily operations
Manual data entry causing errors and costing 20+ hours weekly
Month-end close taking 10+ days due to reconciliation issues
No real-time visibility into cash flow and financial metrics
Multi-currency transactions handled manually in spreadsheets

solution.summary: A unified financial management platform with real-time analytics, automated workflows, and intelligent reconciliation.
approach: Designed microservices architecture for scalability and reliability
Built real-time transaction processing pipeline using Kafka
Created customizable dashboards with sub-second query performance
Developed API integrations with major banking and ERP systems

impact.summary: FinFlow transformed finance operations for 500+ enterprise clients, dramatically reducing manual work and providing unprecedented visibility.

title: Scaling E-Commerce to 50K Concurrent Users
subtitle: Building headless commerce infrastructure for peak performance

problem.summary: An e-commerce platform was crashing during sales events, losing millions in revenue and damaging brand reputation.
details: Platform crashes during Black Friday and flash sales
Estimated $2M+ lost revenue per major outage
No graceful degradation—complete failures instead of partial functionality

solution.summary: A complete re-architecture to event-driven microservices with intelligent auto-scaling and graceful degradation.
approach: Implemented event-driven architecture using Apache Kafka
Designed aggressive caching strategy with Redis
Built auto-scaling policies based on predictive load patterns
Created fallback mechanisms for graceful degradation under extreme load

impact.summary: The re-architected platform handled 10x normal traffic during Black Friday with zero downtime, processing record-breaking sales.

metrics.label: Concurrent Users
metrics.description: Peak concurrent users handled during sales events

metrics.label: Uptime
metrics.description: Availability maintained even during peak events

metrics.label: Black Friday Sales
metrics.description: Increase in Black Friday revenue year-over-year

metrics.label: Response Time
metrics.description: 99th percentile API response time under load

testimonial.quote: For the first time, our platform didn't just survive Black Friday—it thrived. We processed more orders than ever with zero technical issues.
testimonial.author: Michael Torres

title: Healthcare Digital Transformation
subtitle: Bringing patient care into the digital age with HIPAA compliance

problem.summary: A healthcare provider network needed to modernize patient engagement while maintaining strict HIPAA compliance and integrating with legacy EHR systems.
details: Patients frustrated with phone-only appointment scheduling
No secure way for patients to access medical records
25% appointment no-show rate costing millions annually
8 different EHR systems with no unified patient view

solution.summary: A comprehensive patient portal with appointment scheduling, secure messaging, record access, and telehealth—fully HIPAA compliant.
approach: Designed security-first architecture meeting HIPAA requirements
Built FHIR-compliant APIs for EHR integration
Implemented end-to-end encryption for all patient data
Created automated appointment reminders reducing no-shows
Developed WebRTC-based telehealth with recording capabilities

impact.summary: The portal transformed patient engagement, significantly reducing administrative burden while improving patient satisfaction and outcomes.

metrics.label: Active Patients
metrics.description: Monthly active patients using the portal

testimonial.quote: The patient portal has fundamentally changed how we deliver care. Our patients love the convenience, and our staff can focus on what matters—patient care.
testimonial.author: Dr. Amanda Wright
